title: Arches National Park: Construction Projects
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Construction Projects              Construction Projects        NPS/Neal Herbert       Construction projects at Arches National Park may cause delays and closures during your visit. Check the information below for dates and locations of construction. 2016 Parking lots and trailheads in the park will be closed intermittently throughout the summer for construction work. Potential area closures include the visitor center parking lot, Balanced Rock parking, and Sand Dune Arch parking. 2017  Extensive road construction will occur in 2017 and will limit access to some areas. The park will remain open during construction, with possible driving delays, and parking and trail closures. Devils Garden Campground will be closed March 1 through October 31, 2017. Some trails will be closed for two weeks at a time during the project - dates and locations will be posted here.         News Releases         Sort By: Relevance Recently Updated Date Released Title    Show 10 40  per page     Loading results...
